= Simple build environment concept =

The project provides CMake scripts usable in CMakeLists.txt of CPP package.

CPP package can be
  * Library
  * Executable
  * Project - group of Libraries/Executables

The scripts implement
  * Dependency management
  * Build 
  * Unit testing
  * Continues Integration
  * Coverity

== Dependency management ==

Each package has file Properties.cmake. The file contains package description
